name: Memerator
description:
Needs Interweb.

******************************

Memerator

******************************

Meme Craft is a game of meme creation. Are you ahead of the curve on the newest memes? Prove it. Here. Earn more memes, experience towards levels and MemeCredits.

This game allows you to create memes to share with people through emails or text messages. You can gain more memes by earning "MemeCredits". There are two ways to earn MemeCredits:

1 - By participating in the community and voting on other memes, and
2 - By having other people choose your meme.

MemeCredits allow you to expand your library. If you feel the need to cheat, you can always purchase MemeCredits with real monies.

This community is always under development and new features/bug reports are very welcome.

Happy meme-ing.
